text:
="preserve">Igor Anatolievich Chernykh (June 12, 1932 – July 15, 2020) was a Russian cinematographer. He worked for Mosfilm. Chernykh was honored with Honored Artist of the RSFSR in 1988. He was best known for his works in "The Diamond Arm", "Particularly Important Task" and "Private Detective, or Operation Cooperation".
Chernykh died on July 15, 2020 in Moscow from COVID-19, aged 88.
